body: Ok, Translation is not good and plot isn't good as well, but art makes up for it at some degree, chubby body and big tits makes it a good fap.
last page the boy got 2 dick...1 between the boobs and 1 between two girl's face...

What exactly is the point of this rewrite? I mean, its pretty much exactly the same story as the original except the dialogue it reworked and a little shorter per bubble. That said, this is the only version where you can find all three chapters of the story together without the other characters chapters in between them so I'll deal.
